bioAsHtml: Working at the IBM Decision Lab and ILOG before, Laurent led the business rule runtime since 15 years to plug rule-based decision engines in mission critical client applications on premises and on clouds. Laurent has recently lead the move of IBM Operational Decision Manager to the Kubernetes & Docker technology.

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
acceptedTalks.title: Expliquez vos decisions algorithmiques dans le respect du règlement général sur la protection des données (GDPR)

bio: Working at the IBM Decision Lab and ILOG before, Laurent led the business rule runtime since 15 years to plug rule-based decision engines in mission critical client applications on premises and on clouds. Laurent has recently lead the move of  IBM Operational Decision Manager to the Kubernetes & Docker technology.
